Issues with Quantity Values in Variations
Hey there! I've noticed a persistent issue with the quantity values in our variations. When selecting a variation, it's displaying the wrong quantity instead of the auto value we need. This affects both desktop and mobile, so updating it on both platforms would be fantastic. Check out the details in the video!
www.loom.com

Kind Regards,
